title: Gospel of Matthew (19 Commentaries)
description:
Nineteen volumes of commentary on Matthew's gospel; various formats.

The perspectives vary widely, including moderate conservative and liberal, Catholic and Protestant. I believe most of these commentaries represent mainstream scholarship; none of them are from a fundamentalist perspective.

In addition, these commentaries vary widely in their approach and intended audience: there's a devotional commentary, several theological commentaries, several other commentaries that are rather intensely exegetical, one patristic commentary, a couple that might be considered beginner's commentaries, etc. There are also a couple of studies of topics in the gospel. But there are no specialized monographs.

The formatting is generally quite good, but several volumes (such as the Bruners) come from a retail source that doesn't convert with all its formatting intact, so it looks a bit like an OCR'd book. Not great, but readable. (This is especially unfortunate for Bruner, because his work is just about the best commentary I know of. See what Eugene Peterson says about him in this book: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8794164/ .)

Basically this is everything I have that I haven't already uploaded. Well, I may have overlooked something, but I think this is all there is!

1. Fire of Mercy, Heart of the Word, Vol. 1-3 - Erasmo Leiva-Merikakis (epub, mobi)
2. Matthew: A Commentary, Vol. 1-2 - Frederick Dale Bruner (epub, mobi)
3. Matthew and Empire: Initial Explorations - Warren Carter (pdf)
4. Matthew 2e (Readings) - Margaret Davies (pdf)
5. Matthew (Abingdon NT Comt) - Donald Senior (epub, mobi)
6. Matthew (New Cambridge Bible Commentaries) - Craig A. Evans (pdf)
7. The Gospel of Matthew (New Intl Comt on the NT) - R. T. France
8. Commentary on Matthew (Father of the Church) - St. Jerome (pdf)
9. A Commentary on the Gospel of Matthew - Craig S. Keener
10. Matthew (Westminster Bible Companion) - Thomas G. Long
11. The Gospel of Matthew (Catholic Comt on Sacred Scripture) - Curtis Mitch & Edward Sri
12. St. Matthew (The Navarre Bible) - University of Navarre (epub, mobi)
13. Matthew (Zondervan Exegetical Comt on the NT) - Grant R. Osborne & Clinton E. Arnold (epub, mobi)
14. Methods for Matthew - Mark Allan Powell (pdf)
15. The Gospel of Matthew in Its Roman Imperial Context - John K. Riches & David C. Sim (editors) (pdf)
16. Who Is Jesus Christ? Unlocking the Mystery in the Gospel of Matthew - Eric Sammons
17. The Gospel of Matthew - Rudolf Schnackenburg (epub, mobi)
18. Matthew (Paideia Comt on the NT) - Charles H. Talbert (pdf)
19. Matthew: A Devotional Commentary - Leo Zanchettin (epub, mobi)

My thanks to the original uploaders.
